ygData.subject: SimpleDB: welcome to 1999
ygData.msgSnippet: Is somebody from Amazon on this list? Please tell me you re not using GET requests like it describes here:

Is somebody from Amazon on this list? Please tell me you're not using
GET requests like it describes here:

http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonSimpleDB/2007-11-07/DeveloperGuide/MakingRESTRequests.html

Are you calling this REST because it's sexy?

:DG<
